-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Converts Unicode hostnames into ASCII
--   
--   Library to convert internationalized domain names between the ASCII
--   (ACE) and Unicode encodings in accordance with IDNA2008 (RFC 5991:
--   Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol).
--   Unlike IDNA2003, IDNA2008 is not based on RFC 3454: Preparation of
--   Internationalized Strings ("stringprep").
@package idna2008
@version 0.0.1.0


-- | Makes a Unicode hostname internationalized. The code is currently
--   prototyped and untested.
module Data.Text.IDNA2008

-- | Converts a Unicode hostname into an internationalized ASCII hostname.
toASCII :: String -> Maybe String
